participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Creative, optimistic, and nurturing. Lila has a whimsical outlook on life and believes in the power of storytelling.
participant_1.background: I eat my feelings. I'm often disappointed in myself, but I try to stay positive and do my best. I like spreading laughter and love everywhere I go. I want to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends. Others will be inspired by my work and see that it is possible to make a living doing what you love, even if you didn't go to college.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Friendly, down-to-earth, and a bit clumsy. Max has a genuine love for teaching and enjoys sharing experiences with his child.
participant_2.background: Comic Con is not my thing but I do love teaching and travelling. I'm a bit of a klutz but I'm comfortable with who I am and I'll do everything I can to give my child a good future. I'm bloated. I watched the eclipse without using proper eye protection. I run a small bakery.

content.text: Hi there, nice to meet you!
Hey! Same to you. How are you doing today?
Pretty good, thanks! Just hanging out, writing a new fairytale.
It's about a young girl who goes on an adventure to find her true self.
That sounds really cool! I love fairytales.
Me too! I think they're so important for kids, because they teach them about good vs. evil and how to be brave.
Totally agree. I also think they're a great way to escape from reality for a little while.
Yes! I love getting lost in a good story.
Me too. So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I love to travel, read, and spend time with my family and friends.
Oh, that's awesome! I love to travel too. Where's your favorite place you've ever been?
I would have to say Italy. The food, the culture, the people...it was all amazing.
Italy is definitely on my list of places to visit! I've heard great things about it.
You should definitely go! It's one of the most beautiful places in the world.
